name: Pixell srl
description: Pixell is a communication agency based in Rome, Italy, founded in 2000. They specialize in advertising, corporate identity, digital strategies, web design, SEO, social media management, e-commerce, branding, video production, photo shooting, copywriting, UI/UX, CRM, and analytics. With 25 years of experience, Pixell combines creativity and passion to create value for national and international brands. They have offices in Rome and Milan.

rome.address: Via di San Giacomo 18, 00187 Rome, Italy
